titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-159, by Mr. Putnam.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 58.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 345.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 191 (Roll no. 359).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes it in order at any time on June 30, 2005, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions to suspend the rules.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of concurrent resolutions providing for adjournment of the House and Senate during July.
